snippet.title: Former Ritz Carlton President Horst Schulze Talks About The New Frontier In Luxury Hotels
snippet.description: Most everyone knows Horst Schulze as the man who defined the luxury hotel experience through his long tenure as President of The Ritz Carlton Hotels. After resigning over a decade ago, Shulze took the weekend off and then announced to his family, “I’m going to do it one more time.” [...] read »
